tosdr.case: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
quoteDoc: Privacy Policy: Software and Technology Projects
quoteText: Generally, we do not store personally identifiable information (PII), including the IP addresses of users, when collecting bug reports or research data. However, on occasion, we may store IP addresses for limited debugging purposes. (You may also choose to submit these reports and data via Tor in order to prevent us from being able to observe your IP address.)
